Class Automaton

java.lang.Object
Automaton
public abstract class Automaton extends Object
The abstract Automaton class represents any 1D, two-state CA that evolves according to a rule represented by the Rule class.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Joshua Wiseman

      Returns:

    • createAutomaton

      public static Automaton createAutomaton(CellularAutomaton ca, int ruleNum, Generation initial) throws RuleNumException
      Returns an instance of the appropriate Automaton child given a CellularAutomaton value (ECA or TCA). This static method returns null if ca is null.
      Parameters:
      ca - CellularAutomaton type.
      ruleNum - Number of the rule.
      initial - The initial generation.
      Returns:
      Returns an Automaton with the input given.
      Throws:
      RuleNumException - If the ruleNum is not between the range of rules.
